Summary Substantial experience in integrated marketing, strong quantitative and qualitative analysis background, as well as highly-developed communication and presentation skills. 
 
Developed integrated SEM, Direct Response, SEO and social media strategies for various clients. 
 
Directed a number of large-scale marketing campaigns, which included traditional advertising, website development, email marketing and display advertising. 
 
Chemistry study and research-oriented graduate work provided me with strong analytical abilities essential to the field of digital analytics.  
 
Managed internationally recognized brands across multiple external agencies, while collaborating with cross-functional teams. It provided me the interpersonal and presentation skills necessary to communicate with clients from every background at the highest level. Summary Dutta Satadip heads the Customer Success organization for the Americas region at Google. He is responsible for comprehensively driving operational efficiencies and customer service across a multi-billion dollar portfolio of over 150 products. He has more than 18 years of industry experience and has held various senior leadership roles spanning Pre Sales, Business Operations, Product Strategy, Product Management, Product Marketing, Engineering as well as Consulting positions. 
 
Dutta is an experienced strategic and operating executive working globally with developed and emerging countries. He has worked in startups and large corporations scaling businesses by driving customer engagement and strategic revenue oriented partnerships. He has a strong track record of developing innovative market solutions catering to a variety of enterprise customers and consumers.  
 
He is a specialist in organization transformations by being able to make tough team decisions, using analytical approaches to identify levers that execute on the strategy and increasing revenue by building customer loyalty across the organization.  
 
He frequently speaks at major conferences like TEDx on topics like Change Management, Leadership, Cloud Computing and Online Advertising. He serves on the Board of national and international non profit organizations like the National Hemophilia Foundation and Save One Life. Summary I am a seasoned digital expert in business development, strategic partnerships and new ventures.  
 
I currently head up Google Play Apps and Games for Western Europe (UK, DACH, FR, ES, IT). We work with app developers and help to make them successful on Android.  
 
Previously, I did work on new ads initiatives within the product partnerships team at Google London, particularly on data and product partnerships for our advertising products to improve targeting and measurement. I have also done projects in different verticals such as commerce/shopping, B2B, Education, or policy/cultural sector.  
 
For the last 3 years, I am also involved in organising SVC2UK (www.svc2uk.com), a series of tech and entrepreneurship events in London and Cambridge, as well as Google Campus, Google's space for Entrepreneurs in East London, where I managed partnerships.  
 
I bring experience of working for Google in various teams and locations, including Apps BD, Mobile, Business Development, Financial Operations (payments/fraud), change management and operations.  
 
I hold an MBA from Cambridge, speak English, German and French, and have worked in various countries including the US, India, Ireland and the UK.  
 
Specialties: Business Development, Data partnerships, Monetization, Innovation, New Ventures, Change management, Online media, Online Advertising, Payments, Business Process Design, Fraud Operations, People Management, Scaling and Building operational teams.
